chunks.title: Risk Level Classification System
chunks.content: Low Risk: aman, tapi pasif. Medium Risk: assertive terkendali. High Risk: potensi backlash. Setiap opsi harus menjelaskan dampak langsung, risiko tersembunyi, implikasi terhadap posisi dan karier.

chunks.title: Authority Power Gap Risks
chunks.content: High Risk scenarios: konflik terbuka dengan atasan, debat di publik, menolak instruksi langsung. Medium Risk: klarifikasi privat, boundary setting soft, visibility claim. Low Risk: acknowledgement netral, diam strategis, follow-up tertulis.

chunks.title: Public Visibility Risks
chunks.content: High Risk: respons emosional di channel publik, konfrontasi terbuka, pembelaan defensif. Medium Risk: neutral acknowledgement, reframing ke action, de-escalation. Low Risk: tidak respons, minta waktu, klarifikasi privat.

chunks.title: Communication Channel Risk Matrix
chunks.content: Email/Tertulis: risiko dokumentasi tinggi, perlu kehati-hatian. Slack/Chat: risiko salah interpretasi tinggi, perlu kejelasan. Meeting: risiko publik tinggi, perlu persiapan. Private: risiko minimal, tapi perlu follow-up dokumentasi.

chunks.title: Career Impact Risk Assessment
chunks.content: High Impact: promosi, evaluasi performa, konflik dengan atasan. Medium Impact: workload management, team dynamics, visibility. Low Impact: komunikasi sehari-hari, klarifikasi minor, koordinasi rutin.

chunks.title: Pattern Risk Combinations
chunks.content: Safe Combinations: Neutral Acknowledgement + Private Clarification, Reframing to Action + Follow-up. Risky Combinations: Boundary Setting + Public Channel, Visibility Claim + Aggressive Tone. Context-dependent: De-escalation + Power Gap.

chunks.title: Risk Mitigation Strategies
chunks.content: Documentation: sel ada bukti tertulis. Timing: pilih momen yang tepat. Channel: sesuaikan dengan sensitivitas. Allies: cari dukungan jika perlu. Exit Strategy: siapkan rencana cadangan.

chunks.title: Organizational Context Risks
chunks.content: Startup: fleksibilitas tinggi, struktur tidak formal. Corporate: prosedur ketat, dokumentasi penting. Political: aliansi penting, reputasi sensitive. Remote: komunikasi tertitik, visibility challenges.

chunks.title: Personal Risk Profile Factors
chunks.content: Position: junior vs senior, tenured vs new. Performance: high performer vs underperformer. Relationships: strong network vs isolated. History: track record vs controversial.

chunks.title: Risk Decision Framework
chunks.content: Step 1: Assess power gap dan visibility. Step 2: Evaluate career impact. Step 3: Choose appropriate risk level. Step 4: Select matching communication pattern. Step 5: Prepare mitigation strategies.
